column5: It's right up there in your back yard (Toronto) this Sunday starting at 4pm against the Redskins.....Hard game to pick the winner...both teams has a lot of injured players with maybe Washington have more starters out. However, I believe they are deep in talent.  Go Ralph Wilson, and leave the Bills behind....  Edited as per requested....
Im going.......................to be watching it from the comfort of my couch.  ps: edit your post before the spellcheck/grammar police get in here
I hear,their going to sign "PIN BALL" for that one game.

ALERT....ALERT....ALERT....Grammar Police called in.....  Your post should read "I hear they're going to sign "PIN BALL" for that one game. (who ever the heck that is)  Now back to our regular programming....

The best ever Argo player and nicest guy you will ever meet.You talk about HEART.   http://www.google.ca/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=pinball%20clemons&source=web&cd=4&ved=0CEoQFjAD&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.argonauts.ca%2Fpage%2Fstaff-michael-clemons&ei=ByOrTpnCCqTr0gHctN2LDw&usg=AFQjCNH1BTQ44z_vrkaKBUskKmYvlzz73A&sig2=CTDoK7o34HvvP3kY_WI_Dg
Hey BB, if you are going let us know.  it's too rich for me and well, i just don't care...
We have a uniform that will fit him....
Drag yourself out of your mama's basement...sell some extra weed and get us both tickets....
If I could do that I would be on the water fishing rather than be at that game!
Since when do you get money for weeds  Can i get a piece of the action?
I'm going with my Redskin Fan-Atical wife and Bill's nut brother-in-law. Wish me luck!

Four of us drove to 3 hours to Orchard Park and then our wives went shopping and it still cost less then it would to go to a Bills game in T.O.  Problems with Bills in T.O.  1. Corporate bozos badly misjudged the price point  2. It may be a "home" game for the bills but it is more of a neutral site type feel i.e.. no atmosphere.  3. Tough to get regular Joes, and Jills (see what I did there?), in the mood with a lack of a true tailgate... no atmosphere again.  4. Up until this season the Bills have come in with no buzz
That's because GBW has hoarded all the weed in his mama's basement....  (I couldn't resist)
With the price of tickets forget it. Cheapest seat in the house in the nose bleed zone is over $60. Not that many at this price also. All others over $100 with the top seats at just over $285.
Square on the head.   More like a bowl game I suppose.

Really funny thread Billy Bob.  The grammar police, Pin Ball, GBW hoarding weed, hilarious.  Me, I personally don't like to give my $ to feed the beast that is pro sports.  I will be watching, however. Go Bills, Go Vikings
